short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Browser Extension that teaches lichess.org users improve their skills.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows lichess players to download a pgn version of their game to be used alongside the Chess Boom application for further tutorials and game improvements.
